species.name: cyclizar
descriptions: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.
It can sprint at over 70 mph while carrying a human. The rider’s body heat warms Cyclizar’s back and lifts the Pokémon’s spirit.

abilities.name: shed-skin
abilities.effect: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.

abilities.name: regenerator
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/3 max HP upon switching out.
